meta.title: Alles Gut - Your digital sign of life
meta.description: The personal safety app. With regular check-ins, you give your loved ones peace of mind.

hero.description: Alles Gut is your personal safety app. With regular check-ins, you give your loved ones peace of mind - and they are automatically notified if you don't check in.

features.title: Features
features.secureCheckInsDesc: Simple confirmation with one tap. Your digital sign of life.
features.emergencyContactsDesc: Up to 5 trusted people who will be notified.
features.encryptedDesc: Your data stays private. Highest security standards.
features.gdprDesc: Fully compliant with European data protection regulations.
features.pauseDesc: Pause check-ins when you're busy. Strictly limited to 24 hours.

download.title: Download Now
download.description: Available for iOS and Android. Free.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: The protection of your personal data is very important to us. This privacy policy informs you about the type, scope and purpose of processing personal data when using the Alles Gut app.
privacy.section2Content: When using Alles Gut, we collect the following data:
section2List: Email address or phone number (for login)
privacy.section3Content: Your data is protected with state-of-the-art security measures:
privacy.section4Content: We process your data exclusively for the following purposes:
section4List: Notifying your emergency contacts of missed check-ins
privacy.section5Content: Your data is not sold to third parties. Sharing only occurs:
section5List: With your self-selected emergency contacts (only display name and check-in status)
With technical service providers (e.g., email delivery, push notifications) under data processing agreements
privacy.section6Content: You have the following rights regarding your data:
section6List: Access to stored data (data export in the app)
Deletion of your data (account deletion in the app)
privacy.section7Content: Your data is stored as long as your account is active. When you delete your account, all data is permanently deleted.
privacy.section8Content: For privacy questions, you can reach us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These terms of service govern the use of the Alles Gut app. By using the app, you accept these terms.
terms.section1Content: Alles Gut is an app for regular life signs (check-ins). Users can check in at set intervals. If a check-in is missed, the registered emergency contacts are automatically notified.
section2List: You must be at least 16 years old
You need a valid email address or phone number
You are responsible for the security of your account
terms.section3Content: The basic features of Alles Gut are free. We reserve the right to offer paid additional features in the future.
section4List: The accuracy of the data you provide
Obtaining consent from your emergency contacts
The security of your access credentials
terms.section5Content: Alles Gut is a communication tool, not an emergency call system. We accept no liability for:
section5List: Actions or omissions of emergency contacts
Damages arising from use or non-use of the app
terms.section6Content: We strive for high availability but cannot guarantee it. Maintenance and technical problems may cause outages.
terms.section7Content: We reserve the right to change these terms at any time. Significant changes will be announced in the app.
terms.section8Content: You can delete your account at any time in the app settings. We reserve the right to suspend accounts that violate these terms.
terms.section9Content: German law applies. Place of jurisdiction is Germany.
